casebody.data:
IN RE COMM. REV. OF OHIO ADM.CODE CHAPTER 4901:1-10 2019-0573 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 21, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motion for admission pro hac vice of Bradley Klein. Motion granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file a notice of permission to appear pro hac vice with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
